# removeAllRights(completion:)

**Instance Method**

Removes all rights associated with this client from the right store.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeAllRights(completion handler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func removeAllRights() async throws
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: A completion handler to call when the removal operation completes.



## Discussion



Removing rights also removes any resources stored along with the rights, such as secrets.

## Removing stored rights

- **removeRight(_:completion:)**: Removes a right from the right store given an instance of that right.
- **removeRight(forIdentifier:completion:)**: Removes a right from the right store given its unique identifier.
